Projects

SmartBrain App

SmartBrain App detects and marks person's face in the picture. Contains login and register page.

Features: responsive page size, Clarifai face - detection model, Npm - background,

Technologies: React, JS, CSS, Express JS, Node JS, npm JS.

See Live Source Code

RoboFriend App

RoboFriends App fetch users from json test server, creates and displays user cards and generates picture for each user.

Features: user search box, catching errors (during fetch), scrolling navbar.

Technologies: React, JS, npm, tachyons, css.

See Live Source Code

Background Generator Project

User can set up background Gradient in real time and displays with RGB code.

Methods: addEventListener, getElementById, querySelector, linear-gradient.

Technologies: HTML, JS, css.

See Live Source Code

Website presents services provide by Meblorz Mateusz, shows his realizations at gallery and links user with Mateusz social media.
